title: Node operators urged not to upgrade to the latest version of a Bitcoin lightning network node implementation
description: There is a memory leak bug in the recent Lightning Network Daemon (LND) version 0.16.3, and operators are urged not to upgrade

title: Whales Abruptly Move Over $526,000,000 in Bitcoin Amid BTC Bounce – Here’s Where the Crypto Is Going
description:
Crypto whales are suddenly on the move, relocating over half a billion dollars worth of Bitcoin (BTC) as the crypto king attempts to mount a recovery rally.
